amendment.description: Amendment sought to protect the ability of federal agencies to work with local governments to preserve appropriate excess federal property as open space, eliminating federal maintenance expenses while preserving public benefits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-385 to protect the ability of federal agencies to work with local governments to preserve appropriate excess federal property as open space, eliminating federal maintenance expenses while preserving public benefits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 230 (Roll no. 36).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 230 (Roll no. 36).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
